meanings.definition: Sterilants: substances that are used to sterilize or disinfect
meanings.sent1: The hospital used powerful sterilants to clean the surgical equipment.
meanings.sent2: It is important for laboratories to have effective sterilants to maintain a sterile environment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the bottle of sterilants, causing a soapy mess.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to use only natural sterilants in her home was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the sterilants lingered in the air, ensuring everything was clean.

meanings.definition: Sterilants: agents that destroy or eliminate all forms of microbial life
meanings.sent1: The sterilants in the cleaning solution killed all the germs on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals rely on powerful sterilants to prevent the spread of infections.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret weapon was a spray of sterilants that defeated the evil bacteria.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against germs, sterilants were the warriors fighting for cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The sterilants worked tirelessly to ensure a germ-free environment for everyone.
